name: Pengwing
description:
Here here! Tired of reviewing complex gameplays everywhere?

Let us help you relax your mind with a simplistic display of "cute game mechanics".

Pengwing is a cute little penguin that went out for a stroll as its routine. However, due to unforeseeable circumstances, thanks to us Humans, its routine icy paths are now breaking and melting down.

Help the pengwing in an intense attempt to make its way back to its habitat.

P.S: While you're at it, don't mind catching a handful of fishes on the way home. After all, a Pengwing's gotta eat!

Happy reviewing. Please let me know of any and all the suggestions, I would love to adhere to constructive comments. Thank you.
